001package edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Block.ShapeType;
004
005public class Field {
006
007  private static final double TIMING_OFFSET = 0.8;
008  private static final double TIMING_LEVEL_MULTIPLIER = 0.007;
009  private static final int ROW_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_MULTIPLIER = 5;
010  private static final int[] removalScores = {0, 1, 3, 5, 8};
011
012  private final int height;
013  private final int width;
014  private final int bufferHeight;
015  private final Dealer dealer;
016  private final ShapeType[][] contents;
017
018  private Block currentBlock;
019  private Block ghostBlock;
020  private int rowsRemoved;
021  private int levelRowsRemoved;
022  private int level;
023  private int score;
024  private double secondsPerTick;
025  private boolean gameOver;
026
027  public Field(int height, int width, int bufferHeight, Dealer dealer) {
028    this.height = height;
029    this.width = width;
030    this.bufferHeight = bufferHeight;
031    this.dealer = dealer;
032    contents = new ShapeType[height][width];
033  }
034
035  public void start() {
036    if (isGameStarted()) {
037      throw new GameStartedException();
038    }
039    level = 1;
040    computeTiming();
041    addBlock();
042  }
043
044  public boolean rotateLeft() throws GameOverException {
045    checkForGameOver();
046    boolean rotated = currentBlock.rotate(false);
047    if (rotated) {
048      createGhost();
049    }
050    return rotated;
051  }
052
053  public boolean rotateRight() throws GameOverException {
054    checkForGameOver();
055    boolean rotated = currentBlock.rotate(true);
056    if (rotated) {
057      createGhost();
058    }
059    return rotated;
060  }
061
062  public boolean moveLeft() throws GameOverException {
063    checkForGameOver();
064    boolean moved = currentBlock.move(0, -1);
065    if (moved) {
066      createGhost();
067    }
068    return moved;
069  }
070
071  public boolean moveRight() throws GameOverException {
072    checkForGameOver();
073    boolean moved = currentBlock.move(0, 1);
074    if (moved) {
075      createGhost();
076    }
077    return moved;
078  }
079
080  public boolean moveDown(boolean freezeOnFailure) throws GameOverException {
081    checkForGameOver();
082    boolean moved = currentBlock.move(1, 0);
083    if (!moved && freezeOnFailure) {
084      currentBlock.freeze();
085      update(currentBlock.getTopRow() + currentBlock.getLastOccupiedRow());
086      if (currentBlock.getTopRow() + currentBlock.getLastOccupiedRow() < bufferHeight) {
087        gameOver = true;
088      } else {
089        addBlock();
090      }
091    }
092    return moved;
093  }
094
095  void addBlock(ShapeType type) {
096    int width = type.width();
097    int leftCol = (this.width - width) / 2;
098    currentBlock = new Block(type, this, 0, leftCol);
099    currentBlock.move(bufferHeight - currentBlock.getLastOccupiedRow() - 1, 0);
100    currentBlock.move(1, 0);
101    createGhost();
102  }
103
104  private void addBlock() {
105    ShapeType newType = dealer.next();
106    addBlock(newType);
107  }
108
109  public ShapeType get(int rowIndex, int colIndex) {
110    return contents[rowIndex][colIndex];
111  }
112
113  void set(int rowIndex, int colIndex, ShapeType type) {
114    contents[rowIndex][colIndex] = type;
115  }
116
117  public boolean isOccupied(int rowIndex, int colIndex) {
118    return (contents[rowIndex][colIndex] != null);
119  }
120
121  public boolean isOutOfBounds(int rowIndex, int colIndex) {
122    return rowIndex < 0 || rowIndex >= contents.length
123        || colIndex < 0 || colIndex >= contents[rowIndex].length;
124  }
125
126  public int getHeight() {
127    return height;
128  }
129
130  public int getWidth() {
131    return width;
132  }
133
134  public int getBufferHeight() {
135    return bufferHeight;
136  }
137
138  public Block getCurrentBlock() {
139    return currentBlock;
140  }
141
142  public Block getGhostBlock() {
143    return ghostBlock;
144  }
145
146  public int getRowsRemoved() {
147    return rowsRemoved;
148  }
149
150  public int getLevelRowsRemoved() {
151    return levelRowsRemoved;
152  }
153
154  public int getLevel() {
155    return level;
156  }
157
158  public int getScore() {
159    return score;
160  }
161
162  public double getSecondsPerTick() {
163    return secondsPerTick;
164  }
165
166  public boolean isGameStarted() {
167    return level > 0;
168  }
169
170  public boolean isGameOver() {
171    return gameOver;
172  }
173
174  private void update(int rowIndex) {
175    for (; rowIndex >= 0 && !isEmpty(rowIndex); rowIndex--) {
176      int rowsRemoved = removeRows(rowIndex);
177      this.rowsRemoved += rowsRemoved;
178      updateLevel(rowsRemoved);
179      score += removalScores[rowsRemoved];
180    }
181  }
182
183  private int removeRows(int rowIndex) {
184    int rowsRemoved = 0;
185    while (isFull(rowIndex)) {
186      removeRow(rowIndex);
187      rowsRemoved++;
188    }
189    return rowsRemoved;
190  }
191
192  private void updateLevel(int rowsRemoved) {
193    levelRowsRemoved += rowsRemoved;
194    if (levelRowsRemoved >= ROW_THRESHOLD_LEVEL_MULTIPLIER * level) {
195      level++;
196      computeTiming();
197      levelRowsRemoved = 0;
198    }
199  }
200
201  private void removeRow(int rowIndex) {
202    System.arraycopy(contents, 0, contents, 1, rowIndex);
203    contents[0] = new ShapeType[width];
204  }
205
206  private void createGhost() {
207    ghostBlock = currentBlock.clone();
208    //noinspection StatementWithEmptyBody
209    while (ghostBlock.move(1, 0)) {
210      // No statement body code required; movement is done entirely in the condition.
211    }
212  }
213
214  private boolean isFull(int rowIndex) {
215    boolean full = true;
216    ShapeType[] row = contents[rowIndex];
217    for (ShapeType type : row) {
218      if (type == null) {
219        full = false;
220        break;
221      }
222    }
223    return full;
224  }
225
226  private boolean isEmpty(int rowIndex) {
227    boolean empty = true;
228    ShapeType[] row = contents[rowIndex];
229    for (ShapeType type : row) {
230      if (type != null) {
231        empty = false;
232        break;
233      }
234    }
235    return empty;
236  }
237
238  private void computeTiming() {
239    secondsPerTick = Math.pow(TIMING_OFFSET - (level - 1) * TIMING_LEVEL_MULTIPLIER, level - 1);
240  }
241
242  private void checkForGameOver() throws GameOverException{
243    if (gameOver) {
244      throw new GameOverException();
245    }
246  }
247
248  public static class GameStartedException extends IllegalStateException {
249
250    private static final String DEFAULT_MESSAGE = "Game can only be started once.";
251
252    public GameStartedException() {
253      this(DEFAULT_MESSAGE);
254    }
255
256    public GameStartedException(String s) {
257      super(s);
258    }
259
260    public GameStartedException(String message, Throwable cause) {
261      super(message, cause);
262    }
263
264    public GameStartedException(Throwable cause) {
265      super(cause);
266    }
267
268  }
269
270  public static class GameOverException extends IllegalStateException {
271
272    private static final String DEFAULT_MESSAGE = "No movement allowed after game is over";
273
274    public GameOverException() {
275      this(DEFAULT_MESSAGE);
276    }
277
278    public GameOverException(String message) {
279      super(message);
280    }
281
282    public GameOverException(String message, Throwable cause) {
283      super(message, cause);
284    }
285
286    public GameOverException(Throwable cause) {
287      super(cause);
288    }
289
290  }
291
292}
